channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Restoration Australia
channel.desc: Anthony Burke meets retired couple David and Mandy who take on the transformation of a hugely significant historic cottage in Hobart, Tasmania.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: The Gardener
channel.desc: We visit the Saxonwold garden of Michael Hogan, create the perfect hanging shelf for pots and ornaments and look at a plant that is low maintenance a true bang for your buck.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Hoarder House Flippers
channel.desc: Ryan and Kiki have spent all their available cash on this new flip.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
channel.desc: Top Million Dollar Agent sees agents hosts their own episode with their clientele, three other agents and a guest agent as they provide luxurious listings for them to see.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Trading Up With Mandy
channel.desc: Trading Up with Mandy Rennehan follows Blue Collar CEO and multimillion-dollar designer and construction mogul, Mandy Rennehan as she overhauls three unique properties in her beloved hometown of Yarmouth, Nova Scotia.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Finest Homes
channel.desc: Finest Homes explores modern masterpieces and character-filled design, talking to the visionaries who are bringing them to life, as well as the people who live in them.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Wok vs Pot
channel.desc: Silvia and Marion create the ultimate comforting soups, from traditional Tom Yum to a vibrant green pea and pancetta one.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
channel.desc: J.J and Carlee fell in love with a two-story home in the Las Vegas suburbs. They need help to make it the right fit for their tall bodies.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a show celebrating contemporary African lifestyle. The show seeks out the continent's finest design and lifestyle innovation across the spectrum - from interiors and architecture to fashion, arts, food and travel.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Cheap Irish Homes
channel.desc: Maggie and Kieran travel north to help Colin and Lisa, a couple who are currently living in Beaumont with Lisa's mother.

channel.title: Trading Up With Mandy
channel.desc: Trading Up with Mandy Rennehan follows Blue Collar CEO and multimillion-dollar designer and construction mogul, Mandy Rennehan as she overhauls three unique properties in her beloved hometown of Yarmouth, Nova Scotia.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Eyes for the Job
channel.desc: Chris Judge and his community workshop crew help revitalize a deck and yard space, they help homeowner Darren overcome his fear of home maintenance.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Living By Design
channel.desc: Jake and Jazz create more seating space and a touch of African culture to Shadin's space. The reveal meal is Brazilian Style Steak and yummy French Toast Sticks.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food
channel.desc: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food is the ultimate set of go-to recipes that are quick to cook and easy to remember.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Nadiya Bakes
channel.desc: She kicks things off with her no-cheese cheesecake, next up a modern jam roly poly and lastly a taste of the Middle East with a Lebanese bite-sized treat and a pavlova.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Scott's Vacation House Rules
channel.desc: In every episode Scott McGillivray helps make homeowner's dreams come true by unlocking the hidden potential in their dated, uninspired vacation property.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Restoration Australia
channel.desc: Anthony Burke meets a couple who have purchased one of the most significant buildings in the historic town of Kyneton, Victoria.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Wok vs Pot
channel.desc: When it comes to traditional Italian and Thai food, you can't go past a classic Bolognese and Marion's Pad Thai. And what about everyone's favourite desserts, the magical deep fried ice-cream and Italian's Iconic Tiramis?.

channel.desc: We take a closer look at Clivias, do a walk-through of Tanya's much adored front garden, make a kokedama and explore the do's and don'ts of lawn care.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
channel.desc: House hunters are taken to see properties for sale in a foreign country that they want to move to or frequently holiday in.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Finest Homes
channel.desc: Designer Edwin Murphy shares a recent project of his in the Overberg that enjoys generous proportions, while Victoria Wood shares a penthouse design in Umhlanga Durban.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Cheap Irish Homes
channel.desc: Maggie, and Kieran travel to West Cork to help single mom Steffi, who is currently renting but wants a place of her own with her 14-year-old son Cian.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
channel.desc: Brian and Kelly moved from New York to the Las Vegas suburbs for a fresh start. Drew and Jonathan transform the entire main floor and Katherine's play area.
